overview:
Greg Hook specializes in online identification and identity using search engine optimization.

Online Identification is basically an individuals identity online. If your name is Scooby Doo for example, what results appear in a Google search when you use the keywords scooby doo for your search term.

For most people not much shows up, which is fine. However, what if someone where to post something negative about you online and that posting or page shows up when someone searches your name?

Not good right. Actually it can be devastating. In our technology age, most employeers now do a Google search on their applicants prior to hiring them.

Greg Hook has been working hard lately on online identification and has some proven techniques to basically own the first page of a search for individuals.
